list.title: Flight Statistics - learn and improve
list.subtitle:
Flight statistics is a way to get your flight impressions into numbers. See where you are making mistakes, so you can prevent them in your next flight.

Flight statistics is a feature available to our subscribers:

<BuyBtn />

list.title: Collections - tasks and waypoints for every purpose
list.subtitle:
Collections enable you to create different tasks and waypoints for specific occasions. Want to go fly in Argentina, but don't want to mix the waypoints with your home ones? Add a new collection ;) 

Collections are available for our subscribers:

<BuyBtn />

list.title: Weather
list.subtitle:
Weather is not enabled in trial mode.

<BuyBtn />
